text: Artificial intelligence (AI) is swiftly revolutionizing various sectors, notably education. In the realm of educational management, AI is utilized to enhance instructional methodologies, boost student performance, and simplify administrative operations. This study seeks to investigate the deployment of AI in educational management, addressing both its advantages and challenges. Utilizing a systematic review approach, the research analyzes existing literature on AI applications within educational management. The findings reveal that AI offers numerous benefits, such as enhancing student engagement, personalizing education, and reducing costs. Nonetheless, AI introduces several challenges, including ethical dilemmas, potential biases, and the necessity to train the workforce anew. The study concludes that AI holds significant potential to enhance educational management, although it requires cautious and thoughtful implementation.
